authors.author: Oswald J. Smith Roger M. Hickman

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Saved! I'm saved thro' Christ,
My all in all.
Saved! I'm saved,
Whatever may befall.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
He died upon the cross for me,
He bore the awful penalty.
And now I'm saved eternally,
I'm saved! Saved! Saved!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Saved! Saved! Saved!
My sins are all forgiv'n,
Christ is mine!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I'm on my way to heaven,
Once a guilty sinner, lost, undone,
Now a child of God,
Saved thro' His Son.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Saved! Saved! Saved!
By grace and grace alone.
Oh, what wondrous love

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
To me was shown,
In my stead
Christ Jesus bled and died.
Bore my sins,
For me was crucified.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Saved! Saved! Saved!
Oh joy beyond compare!
Christ my life,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
And I His constant care,
Yielding all and trusting Him alone,
Living now each moment as His own.
